evidence.text: Signed by District Judge Debra M. Brown on 8/14/2020.
Signed by District Judge Debra M. Brown on 12/14/20.
Signed by Magistrate Judge Jane M. Virden on 3/12/20.

ORDER REASSIGNING CASE. Case reassigned to District Judge Sharion Aycock for all further proceedings. District Judge Debra M. Brown no longer assigned to case. ... Signed by District Judge Debra M. Brown on 12/28/2021.

TEXT ONLY ORDER granting [129] Motion for Extension of Time to File Response re [127] MOTION to Dismiss Plaintiff's Fifth Amended Complaint Against Marshal Turner and to Partially Vacate Prior Order [87] Under Rule 54. Responses now due by 4/1/2022. No further written order will issue from this Court. Signed by District Judge Sharion Aycock on 3/09/2022.
ORDER AND MEMORANDUM OPINION granting in part and denying in part 127 Motion to Dismiss; LIFTING STAY. Signed by District Judge Sharion Aycock on 3/22/23.
